title: 9-18-17 Sara Gallegos and Patricia Belyea  Chat with Pat on Pat Sloan's Talk show for American Patchwork and Quilting Radio
description:
Sara Gallegos and I meet at Baby lock when filming a release for the new Destiny II machine. I’ve meet Sara before but that was the first we’d worked together and had such fun! She is an amazing teacher and versed in an incredible number of techniques. Also machine expert, and today we are going to get learn a little bit about how quilters can use their serger for.. quilts!

Visit Sara sewpositivelysara.com/ 
-------------
I love meeting and getting to know people passionate about making quilts. I found that in Patricia Belyea of okanarts. Patricia opens her about page with this “Every quilt is a gift to the world. For the maker, it’s a creative meditation. For the receiver, it’s usually awe. In every way, quilting is a profound and positive activity.“ Patricia imports, creates, teaches about, and sells Japanese textiles. I’m excited to learn more about the these textiles and Patricia has a new book that will help you explore them!
okanarts.com/
----------------
Chat with Pat, I tell you about my museum exhibit & do a Q&A
